sentences.sContent: In case of urgency, call the police.
sentences.sContent_eng: In case of urgency, call the police.

sentences.sContent: I appreciate the sense of urgency because I feel it myself.
sentences.sContent_eng: I appreciate the sense of urgency because I feel it myself.
sentences.sCn: 我欣赏这种紧迫的感觉因为我自己就能体会到。

sentences.sContent: However pressing the need and urgency of the problem one should not proceed without a plausible plan.
sentences.sContent_eng: However pressing the need and urgency of the problem one should not proceed without a plausible plan.
sentences.sCn: 无论需要多么紧迫，问题多么紧急，一个人不能没有看似有理的计划就开始行动。

words.tran: 强烈的欲望，迫切要求；推动力
